name: In re Petition for Involuntary Termination of Parental rights of Richard BERKEY, Sr.
name_abbreviation: In re Involuntary Termination of Parental rights of Berkey

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re Petition for Involuntary Termination of Parental rights of Richard BERKEY, Sr.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: G. David Pauline, Carlisle, for appellant.
William R. Bunt, New Bloomfield, for Perry County Children & Youth Service.
Daniel Stern, Harrisburg, for the Subject Children, Teresa & Richard Berkey, Jr.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1153
In re Petition for Involuntary Termination of Parental rights of Richard BERKEY, Sr.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 19, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
G. David Pauline, Carlisle, for appellant.
William R. Bunt, New Bloomfield, for Perry County Children & Youth Service.
Daniel Stern, Harrisburg, for the Subject Children, Teresa & Richard Berkey, Jr.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
